spotifyMusicQuiz.title: Spotify Music Quiz
spotifyMusicQuiz.description: Guess songs from a Spotify playlist
spotifyMusicQuiz.details: Listen to short clips from a Spotify playlist and guess the song title and artist.
spotifyMusicQuiz.playlistUrlHelp: Enter the URL of a Spotify playlist
spotifyMusicQuiz.invalidPlaylistUrl: Please enter a valid Spotify playlist URL
spotifyMusicQuiz.pleaseWait: Please wait while we fetch songs from Spotify...
spotifyMusicQuiz.noSongsMessage: We couldn't load any songs from this playlist. Please try again or use a different playlist.
spotifyMusicQuiz.spotifyLoginRequired: To access your playlists, please connect to Spotify
spotifyMusicQuiz.noPlaylistsFound: No playlists found for your account
